posts.text:
Setting up or buying rape makes you a rapist. 

Anyone being trafficked is enslaved because they cannot leave. 

You almost never need to qualify the type of rape. It is a way we create ranking systems in our head. 

Call them rapists. The proper term for both is rapist. 

2/
#epstein
#trump
#rape
